item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, July 13, 2024 at 2:30 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Biden vows to ‘complete the job’ despite stumbles in press conference
2. Unilever to slash a third of office jobs in Europe
3. Russia believed to be behind plot to kill European defence boss
4. Starmer’s relegation of 31 Labour MPs and peers creates cohort of potential troublemakers
5. [Opinion] Why is the populist right surging across Europe, but not Britain?
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, July 13, 2024 at 2:30 AM UTC
